turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'd like to schedule a checkup with my primary care physician, Dr. Ramirez. Do you have access to her schedule?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I do. Just a moment while I access Dr. Ramirez's availability... Okay, I see some openings next week. Are you available on Tuesday or Thursday?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Tuesday is better. What times are available on Tuesday?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me see... On Tuesday, Dr. Ramirez has openings at 9:00 AM, 11:30 AM, and 2:00 PM.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, 11:30 AM works perfectly. Can I book that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, you're all set. Your appointment with Dr. Ramirez is scheduled for Tuesday at 11:30 AM. I've sent you a confirmation email with all the details. Are there any other questions?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Actually, yes. I need a flu shot as well. Can I get that during the checkup, or do I need a separate appointment?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I'm sorry, I am unable to give you information about flu shots. Please call the office and speak to a nurse for these types of questions. Or you can just go to the office, if you want.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I will do that. Thanks for scheduling the checkup!
